overview: The Symphonies were recorded live with a special recording concept by Herbert von Karajan, and he did not only direct the filming, but also closely followed the editing and mastering of the symphonies. Karajans mid-1970s Tchaikovsky interpret
tagline: Tchaikovsky performed eloquently with exclamation marks!!!
title: Karajan Tchaikovsky Symphonies 4, 5 & 6
